entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Fatal error. Internal CLR error. (0x80131506) in .NET 6 #86775
  • [wasm] `JIT.Performance` taking more than 30mins, and timing out #86772
    8.0.0
  • GDV: Multiple type-checks work items #86769
    Future
  • Blazor Wasm: debugging broken by attribute with type parameter #86765
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Progress Reporting in HttpClient Methods #86761
  • JIT: Expand address peeling in block morphing to handle array indexing expressions #86755
    Future
  • Frame not in module when hitting a breakpoint in Blazor WASM #86754
    8.0.0
  • NET7.0 use memory，linux > windows，so much~~~~~ more，why #86749
  • System.InvalidCastException: Arg_InvalidCastException after upgrading blazor webassembly from .net 6 to .net 7 #86748
  • AuthenticateAsServer slow in android #86746
  • Test failure System.Diagnostics.Tests.ProcessTests.TotalProcessorTime_PerformLoop_TotalProcessorTimeValid #86739
    Future

Closed

  • IsAssignableFrom returns false when cross different AssemblyLoadContexts #86756
  • IDispatch::GetTypeInfoCount fails after upgrading to .NET6 #86751
  • [wasm][jiterpreter] memory access out of bounds when running with Profiled AOT + Jiterpreter #86710
    8.0.0
  • .Net 4.8 fails with 7.0.1 ProtectedData's binding redirect. #83008
    7.0.x
  • [browser] Top-level await promise never resolved #86037
    8.0.0
  • X509Certificate2 Issuer is empty on Linux in netcoreapp3.1 #86679
  • [mono][interpreter] System.Diagnostics.Debugger.Break() does not show any callstack when running with interpreter enabled #86148
    8.0.0
  • [mono] Re-enable passing Vector128 arguments in SIMD registers #74583
    8.0.0
  • RuntimeError: Failed to create a .NET runtime (coreclr) using the parameters {}. #86750
  • [API Proposal]: Add Length and IsEmpty properties to System.BinaryData #77970
    8.0.0
  • .NET Runtime 5.0.9 / .NET SDK 5.0.400 not available for Ubuntu 18.04 #57391
    Future
  • [release/3.1] CI failure: System.IO.Tests.DirectoryInfo_Create.PathWithReservedDeviceNameAsPath_ThrowsDirectoryNotFoundException #77233
    Future
  • System.IO.FileInfo.MoveTo() failing, System.IO.File.Move() working #35122
    Future
  • Silent fail to delete a file with special character in Alpine Linux #37096
    Future
  • [AOT] ExpressionTree AOT very slow #86568
  • Remove BinaryFormatter usage from ResourceReader #39290
    Future
  • DEBUGGING IS NOT ENABLED for new Blazor WASM project in Chromium. #84171

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2188521 #86779
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: expand qmarks earlier #86778
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Change our Android build and test legs to use the new CBL-Mariner-based images. #86776
    os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: Allow RBO for known relops even without a dominator #86774
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • update MediaTypeNames #86770
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Enable EventPipe support in MacOS #86766
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add back cmake command-line cache on unix #86764
    area-Infrastructure
  • Remove remaining `ASG` terminlogy from the codebase #86760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [draft][browser] thread experiments #86759
    arch-wasm, area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • [WIP] System.Linq.Expressions.Interpreter.CallInstruction creation should respect IsDynamicCodeSupported #86758
    NO-REVIEW, area-System.Linq.Expressions
  • Don't disable AutoreleasePoolSupport by default when enabling trimming. #86753
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [wasm] Re-enable ~6700 runtime tests that got disabled mistakenly #86747
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Run sdk tests on wasm PRs #86744
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] Perf: Use `test-main.js` instead of `test-main-7.0.js` #86742
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-VM-meta-mono, perf-pipeline
  • Address Metrics APIs issues #86740
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 8.0.0

Merged

  • Define the managed dependencies of the crossgen-corelib.proj file through ProjectReferences #86735
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add some more testing around shadowing, inheritance, and project boundaries. #86732
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, test-enhancement, source-generator
  • [release/8.0-preview5] Bump net7 version to 7.0.7 #86771
    Servicing-approved, area-Build-mono
  • Use cinv and cneg instead of csel when possible #84926
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Install latest LTS npm/node for codespaces #86767
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • Make helix-inner-step send job warnaserror the same between windows and non-windows platforms #86729
    area-Infrastructure
  • [NativeAOT] Handle event pipe environment variable configuration and output to file #86656
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add `DiagnosticOr<T>` type for gracefully handling failures in incremental generator transformations #86603
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [mono][debugger] Don't pass uninitialized context to debugger #86625
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [Mono] Pass SIMD type variables using SIMD registers #86634
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Ensure that the generated JsonSerializerContext.Default static property returns a sigleton. #86757
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Add IsEmpty and Length properties to System.BinaryData #86721
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Initial work to enable EventPipe in Linux #86226
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2187956 #86733
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [browser] threads & js cleanup #86278
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Adjust physical promotion heuristics #86660
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Fix rare case where an AOT method's arg_offsets were uninitialized #86745
    area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • [interp] Add float32 Vector128.Equals #86738
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Add Microsoft.Extensions.Diagnostics.* to Aspnet Transport package #86725
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0-preview5] Add Microsoft.Extensions.Diagnostics.* to Aspnet Transport package #86730
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Use globalization invariant mode + prefer speed for AOT compilers #86691
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-preview5] [mono][wasm] Fix support for virtual invokes. #86709
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/8.0-preview5] Bump package version for .net 7 to 7.0.6 #86717
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries

Updated

  • Add message details for AmbiguousMatchException #84512
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Enable option to use the Windows ThreadPool #85373
    area-System.Threading
  • [NativeAOT] A few changes to make stack walks a bit faster #86690
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Upgrading SpanHelpers with Vector512 #86655
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Bump main version to Preview 6 #86675
    area-Infrastructure
  • Up Minimum CMake Version to 3.20 #86530
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Adapt Tarjan generic cycle detector for use in Crossgen2 #71426
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [mono][tasks] Extract EmitWasmBundle into generic EmitBundle task and enable bundling in mono self-contained library #84191
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Guarded devirtualization: multiple type checks #86551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Introduction to vectorization with Vector128 and Vector256 #84115
    area-Meta
  • Optimize scalar conversions with AVX512 #84384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • StringBuilder: use Span.Fill in Append repeating char #86287
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Fix StringMarshalling error message and actually copy attributes from methods to shadows #86731
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Add support for types with parameterized ctors to config binder gen #86365
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • Delete `GT_CNS_LNG` #85951
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Attempt to fix unfailing helix test run when testResults.xml are missing #86342
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix crashing bug in StringDecoder.decode when accessing SharedArrayBuffer from different JavaScript realm/iframe #86664
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Implement stream-based ZipFile ExtractToDirectory and CreateFromDirectory method overloads #85491
    area-System.IO.Compression, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Use `NativeMemory` in `System.Data.Odbc` #85966
    area-System.Data, community-contribution
  • Delete simple quirks left from the `ASG` removal #86726
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Optimized conversions between `Half` and `Single`. #81632
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Convert.Try{From/To}HexString #86556
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Fix ISA outerloop tests #86705
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [nativeaot][tests] Add Native AOT iOS perf scenarios #85317
    os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Exploit unallocated zero page to remove null checks in jiterpreter #86403
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Update NativeAot with latest ILLink changes #86712
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Exclude unused bundle files in AppleAppBuilder #86316
    area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [WIP][Mono] Add the capability of trimming IL code of individual methods #86722
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [browser] Fix fingerprinting of relinked dotnet.js during build #86048
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` normalization unblocking APIs that became supported. #86694
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [mono][tests] Run Mono iOS sample on Helix #86578
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Update ILCompiler paths to handle PublishAotUsingRuntimePack=true #85996
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Expand CORINFO_HELP_CHKCASTANY cast #86728
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Improving HelloiOS sample for NativeAOT to be testable with runtime packs #86652
    NO-MERGE, os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Avoid capturing the ExecutionContext for the whole HTTP connection lifetime #86213
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • QUIC ALPN list narrowing down scenario test #86659
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [mono][wasm] marshal-ilgen is dropped when not required #86035
    NO-MERGE, area-Build-mono
  • Enable CS1591 for projects that don't use intellisense package XML file #84917
    bug, area-Infrastructure-libraries, blocking-release, 8.0.0
  • Tar: Improve unseekable stream handling #84279
    area-System.Formats.Tar, 8.0.0
  • [7.0] Disable DllImportSearchPathsTest in mobile #86708
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: Have physical promotion insert read backs before possible implicit control flow #86706
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix crossgen2.pdb #86512
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Implement resource lookup in satellite assemblies #86689
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Share UTF8 converters between coreclr and mono #85558
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Clone files on OSX-like platforms when possible, instead of copying the whole file #79243
    area-System.IO, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V][JIT] Fix branch #86482
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-25
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Fix a few issues #2289

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Miscellaneous exception handling fixes #2287
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Do not share memory for wasi #2288

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Installing the dotnet 7 SDK on Ubuntu Jammy seems to only install the runtime. #32804
  • Project which Built in Windows does not clean with command in Ubuntu #32803

PullRequests

Created

  • Back up to latest 17.7 build for p5 #32826
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2188153 #32811
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • BlazorWasmSdk: Fix duplicate imports #32799
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [release/7.0.4xx] support correct property name and ensure compat with old name #32085
    Area-Containers

Updated

  • Read workload sets in workload manifest reader #32766
    Area-Workloads
  • Make GeneratePublishDependencyFile incremental #32305
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Preview 6 branding #32796
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Make GenerateToolsSettingsFileFromBuildProperty incremental #32798
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Add details command #31743
    untriaged
  • Add PackageReference to new Roslyn package (#29787) #32734
    Area-Compilers, Servicing-approved, 7.0.8
  • add two artifacts-output-related-telemetry properties to emitted events #32685
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #32724
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Containers: add support for using 'podman' without a system 'docker' alias. #32783
    untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Feature 'document highlights' is currently unavailable due to an internal error #68328
  • Prefer "this" when referencing an override function (CodeStyle option in C#) #68326
  • VB.Net Pretty listing (reformatting) of code changes floating point number #68323
  • Feature 'Find usages' is currently unavailable due to an internal error #68320
  • MyProject.GeneratedMSBuildEditorConfig.editorconfig' could not be found. Receiving error MSB6006: "csc.dll" exited with code 139 #68319
  • Region analysis produces unexpected result for ref-expression. #68315

Closed

  • Enum.GetName called on a non-enum type #68329
  • Generated field is not working well since the last update #68322
  • Edit and Continue for members of generic types #29667
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Update EnC-Supported-Edits.md #68327
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Clear dead links to feature branches in `Language Feature Status.md` #68317
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Skip checks for overridden or hidden members in overload resolution with extension methods #68316
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Use Enum.GetName correctly #68330
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Make 'generate field' work better with implicit object creation #68325
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Cache evaluated parameters for public method symbols #68256
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • CodePages reference only needed for netstandard #68324
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Move inline arrays tests to Emit2 project due to reaching the string heap limit #68321
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays

Updated

  • Expect mapped paths in InterceptsLocationAttribute #68242
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add new (hopefully easier) telemetry mechanism #68261
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Ensure that we always run all diagnostic suppressors for single file analysis #68270
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix Color Color const field initialization accessing the Color type #68283
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Support 'foreach' for inline arrays. #68297
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Add support for ref returning methods and properties in `With` statement. #68203
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Locals and Returns, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Resolving layout attribute on Razor component pages is the hot path in Fortunes benchmark using Blazor SSR #48434
  • Improve individual auth in spa templates #48433
  • IConfigurationRoot.Reload not working #48425
  • Authentication failed when local time difference of 10 minute with server time #48422
  • Cookie name are case-sensitive #48421
  • ./restore.cmd problem #48420
  • "DisposeFailed" log messages of Blazor CircuitHost should be more visible #48418

Closed

  • Replace internal Microsoft.Extensions.Metrics with package #47618
    8.0-preview5
  • .net8 preview 4: Hosting environment not detected via Blazor-Environment header #48271
    8.0-preview5
  • Update the ASP.NET Core hosted Blazor WebAssembly template to use _Host.cshtml #25631
    .NET 8 Planning
  • We can interleave Static/Server/WebAssembly components within an app #46394
    8.0-preview6
  • Microsoft.Authentication.WebAssembly.Msal triggering SSO redirect to AAD three times in rapid sequence #48196
  • Asp.Net core takes 12 minutes for initial page load #48215

PullRequests

Created

  • [Blazor] Support for primitive types in [SupplyParameterFromForm] #48432
    area-blazor
  • Remove IdentityServer from spa-templates #48430
    area-identity
  • Do not emit unused fields in RDG source #48426
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Fix display format for type. #48419
    NativeAOT, feature-rdg, area-minimal, 8.0-preview5

Merged

  • [release/8.0-preview5] [SignalR] Seamless Reconnect #48427
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-signalr, 8.0-preview5
  • [release/8.0-preview5] Remove IdentityServer from spa-templates #48431
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-mvc, 8.0-preview5

Updated

  • Add dependency injection support for object pools #48217
    area-runtime
  • Improve performance of output cache #48328
    feature-middleware, area-perf, feature-output-caching
  • [Blazor] Initial support for [SupplyParameterFromForm] #48412
    area-blazor
  • Update project resolution and app settings writes in `dotnet user-jwts` #48385
    area-commandlinetools, feature-userjwts
  • [7.0] Allow overriding the host header if doesn't match the absolute-form host #48415
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, 7.0.x
  • Testing updated install scripts #47951
    area-infrastructure, area-commandlinetools, * NO MERGE *, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2188310 #48387
    area-mvc
  • use new System.Text.Ascii APIs, remove internal helpers #48368
    area-runtime
  • Issue #45096 Toru_Watanbe #48352
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • [SignalR] Seamless Reconnect #48338
    area-signalr
  • Change API template to only use Invariant Globalization in Native AOT… #48238
    area-mvc

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Maui xaml x:static can not get value from base class? #15286
  • Maui xaml x:static can not get value from base class? #15285
  • Buttons offscreen inside ScrollView do not work on iOS #15283
  • Swipe gestures attached to rotated controls are rotated on Android #15280
  • dotnet publish does not find keystore #15279
  • Brakes ... Maui Windows so it will not startup suspected Xaml Grid Pattern with * (stars) #15276
  • Flyout Page: iOS version doesn't have a native hamburger icon for the flout menu #15258
  • Navigating to a page with Maps multiple times Increase RAM Usage but doesn't reduce it back after navigating back #15257
  • OnPageAppearing firing before the OnNavigatedTo event for a page #15256
  • [Windows][CarouselView] HorizontalScrollBarVisibility="Never" not working in CarouselView on Windows platform #15253

Closed

  • Problem with MAX_PATH #15042
  • IOS Compiling Error #10907
    Backlog
  • RightToLeft: left padding is treated as left, but left margin is treated as right #9074
    Backlog
  • FlexLayout doesn't respect Padding #8483
    Backlog
  • Button is not adapting to theme changes if IsEnabled is changed #9220
    Backlog
  • Does MAUI support global hotkey ? #15236
    Backlog
  • Changing the UserAppTheme does not change the colours appropriately #7664
    .NET 8
  • Maui embedded issues: DisplayAlert not working and Application.Current is null #7887
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Obsolete Dictionary and shift to single state object #15281
  • Allows support for other default browsers on Android to work with the Web Authenticator #15278
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Update cake scripts #15277
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Set DOTNET_gcServer #15275
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net7.0] [Android] Disable caching when loading images from streams #15274
    area/image :framed_picture:
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.RecyclerView from 1.3.0.1 to 1.3.0.2 #15272
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Navigation.UI from 2.5.3.2 to 2.5.3.3 #15271
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.Google.Crypto.Tink.Android from 1.9.0 to 1.9.0.1 #15270
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Window.WindowJava from 1.0.0.12 to 1.0.0.13 #15269
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Palette from 1.0.0.17 to 1.0.0.18 #15268
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Lifecycle.LiveData from 2.6.1.1 to 2.6.1.2 #15267
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.SwipeRefreshLayout from 1.1.0.12 to 1.1.0.13 #15266
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.MediaRouter from 1.3.1.3 to 1.4.0.1 #15265
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Navigation.Fragment from 2.5.3.2 to 2.5.3.3 #15264
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.AppCompat.AppCompatResources from 1.6.1.1 to 1.6.1.2 #15263
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Navigation.Runtime from 2.5.3.2 to 2.5.3.3 #15262
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.Google.Android.Material from 1.8.0.1 to 1.9.0.1 #15261
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Navigation.Common from 2.5.3.2 to 2.5.3.3 #15260
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Browser from 1.5.0.1 to 1.5.0.2 #15259
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Merged

  • Bump main stable versions #15247

Updated

  • Add UITest Gallery and some simple tests #15191
    area/testing
  • Improved WebUtils.ParseQueryString() #15245
    area/essentials 🍞
  • [net7.0] Fix e-mail URI escaping recipients #15244
    area/essentials 🍞
  • [net7.0] [Windows] Notify changes in CollectionView Layouts #15250
    area/collectionview 📃
  • Fix issue with CollectionView ignoring margins for content #15246
    area/collectionview 📃
  • [net8.] Merge main #15186
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Don't retain parameters not passed as query string parameters #14965
    t/breaking 💥, p/1, area/shell 🐢, partner/cat 😻, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Remove HandlerImpl folder and put partial files together #14339
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Android: fix dialog button colors in dark mode #15091
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-dialogalert
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #15235
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Migrations cannot be applied when project name contains non ASCII character #30972
  • constant value of Double.Epsilon(c# ) in where clause does not return data #30969
  • Make migrations .Designer file optional #30967

Closed

  • questionsoc:qcom:msm8953,cver:18.17.38,cbrand:OPPO,cbr:com.google.android.youtube,csdk:27,cbrver:18.17.38,cosver #30970
  • Add suppressTransactions optional flag to DbContext.Database.Migrate methods #30881

PullRequests

Created

  • Move away from unsupported version of .NET Framework #30968

Updated

  • [release/7.0] Stop skipping shadow skip navigation slots when creating the shadow values array #30911
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.8
  • Always convert to parameter query roots in relational #30966
